com.mingsoft.cms.action

类 ColumnAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mingsoft.base.action.BaseAction
      • com.mingsoft.basic.action.BaseAction
        • com.mingsoft.cms.action.ColumnAction

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/${managerPath}/cms/column")
public class ColumnAction
extends com.mingsoft.basic.action.BaseAction
